entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who is upset about Ginny seeing Michael. He is described as someone who would take it badly if he knew.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a person who is seeing Michael, and Ron is upset about it. She is described as someone who hasn't told Ron about her relationship with Michael.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is mentioned as a person that Ginny is seeing, and Ron is upset about it. He is described as someone who is the subject of Ron's anger.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is talking to Harry and trying to distract him from his anger. She is described as someone who is observant and notices how Cho looks at Harry.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as a person who has feelings for Harry, and Hermione notices it. She is described as someone who can't keep her eyes off Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is the subject of Cho's affections, and Ron's anger. He is described as someone who is oblivious to his own feelings.

relationships.description: Ron is angry at Ginny for seeing Michael, and he expresses it in a harsh tone. (‘this is exactly why Ginny hasn’t told you she’s seeing Michael...’)
Ron is angry at Michael Corner for being with Ginny, and he expresses it in a harsh tone. (‘impr ecations about Michael Corner’)
Hermione notices that Cho has feelings for Harry, and she mentions it to him. (‘she just couldn’t keep her eyes off you’)
Cho has feelings for Harry, and Hermione notices it. (‘she just couldn’t keep her eyes off you’)
